code: import client from'./client';export var login=function login(_ref){var username=_ref.username,password=_ref.password;return client.post('/api/auth/login',{username:username,password:password});};export var register=function register(_ref2){var formData=_ref2.formData;return client({url:'/api/auth/register',method:'post',data:formData,header:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}});};export var check=function check(){return client.get('/api/auth/check');};export var logout=function logout(uid){return client.post('/api/auth/logout?uid='+uid);};export var duplicateCheck=function duplicateCheck(_ref3){var username=_ref3.username;return client.post('/api/auth/duplicate_check',{username:username});};
